title: Cindy Crawford Meaningful Beauty CREME DE SERUM 30ml/1oz
description: A brilliant new approach to fighting the visible signs of aging, Meaningful Beauty Crme de Srum is formulated to combine the potency of a serum with the rich moisturizing effect of a cream. It's not only designed to visibly help skin's overall firmness and hydration lost through the years but it also contains a unique peptide blend designed to target the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Hyaluronic Acid is designed to maintain the skin's hydration helping enhance skin's softness and suppleness, while Vitamin C is hard at work protecting the skin from oxidative damage. Crme de Srum also features our exclusive super-antioxidant SOD, derived from a rare French melon. Apply in the morning or at night to clean face, using one to two pumps. Only use once a day.

title: Neutrogena Rapid Tone Repair Moisturizer Dark Spot Corrector Serum, 1 Fluid Ounce
description: Instantly brighter skin. Visible results in just one week. Instant: this high-potency formula absorbs quickly into skin to deliver our highest concentration of vitamin C, instantly brightening skin. So effective, 100% of women had visible results, instantly. One week: with highly concentrated accelerated retinol sa, this advanced corrector works to renew the look of skin, brightening skin's tone and helping to improve the look of stubborn dark spots and discoloration, revealing noticeably more even, younger looking skin in just one week. Formulated with accelerated retinol sa, which is clinically proven to help: diminish the look of stubborn dark spots and discoloration brighten skin's tone improve skin's clarity and radiance smooth fine lines and texture. Vitamin C: formulated with vitamin C to gently help diminish the look of dark spots and discoloration, for brighter, more even skin tone. Accelerated retinol sa is a unique combination of the following ingredients: retinol sa: exclusive sustained action works to continuously renew the look of skin throughout the day, helping to diminish the look of dark spots and smooth wrinkles fast. Retinol sa is scientifically proven superior to other forms of vitamin A, such as pro-retinol and retinyl palmitate, in its activity. Glucose complex: a retinol sa booster that accelerates skin's surface activity for rapid results. Hyaluronic acid: adds renewing moisture to help hydrate, replenish and rejuvenate the look of skin. Gentle enough for daily use. For all skin tones.

title: L'oreal Voluminous Mascara Custom Curved Brush, Black, 0.28-Fluid Ounce
description: Voluminous curved brush volume building mascara is uniquely formulated to resist clumping, soften lashes, and build lashes to 5x their natural thickness. Volume maximizing curved brush matches the shape of your lashes and thickens lashes evenly and smoothens.

title: L'Oreal Paris Double Extend Concentrated Lash Boosting Serum, 0.18 Ounces
description: The 24-hour lash boosting power system is the ultimate starter kit for visibly longer, thicker, fuller looking fringe of lashes. Transform your natural lashes by using lash boosting serum underneath mascara and overnight on bare lashes, and maximize your natural lash appearance. The L’Oreal Paris research laboratories have specially formulated lash boosting technology to maximize your natural lash appearance. How? Each lash boosting product contains: a unique pro-keratin complex of fortifying amino acids, panthenol etc.

title: WEN By Chaz Dean Fall Apple Spice Cleansing Conditioner 16 Oz

title: L'Oreal Paris Voluminous Butterfly Mascara Waterproof, Black, 0.21 Fluid Ounce
description: Stretch and extend your lashes like wings! Introducing Voluminous Butterfly Mascara, one of our most-exciting mascara innovations, yet. It’s revolutionary Butterfly Brush™ with asymmetrical lash line shape extends and lifts outer corner lashes to give you a winged-out effect, instantly volumizing lashes at the roots and stretching lashes outward. The unique Cocoon Fibers™ instantly wrap lashes in a soft, delicate veil to create silky, spectacular lashes that flutter.
